1bn euro bill to end La Liga?From the section European FootballVideoNeville's England departure 'came as a surprise'From the section EnglandVideoLearning to love their sport again - England stars in lockdownFrom the section SportCoronavirus 'could affect international calendar for two or three years'Coronavirus could impact on the international football calendar for "two or three years", says Lars-Christer Olsson, of Uefa's executive committee.Kitson wants to take over as PFA chiefMOTD podcast: Rank the best players outside the 'big six'From the section Premier LeagueNeymar & Mbappe's future and who qualifies for Europe? The fallout for French footballFrom the section European FootballFormer Leeds and England defender Cherry dies, aged 72From the section Leeds'I'm sure he will go on to do great things' - Bright surprised by Neville exit from England roleFrom the section EnglandToday's football gossipInsight: Must-read football storiesThe football team rising from America's biggest ruinIn the city that suffered America’s biggest municipal bankruptcy in 2013, one football team is playing a special role in fighting decline.How 'Gladiator' Dybala went from rough diamond to 'Juventus Jewel'Tears, fears & West Brom – The young spark who bounced back at BayernHow Didier Drogba helped halt a civil warHow single-minded Sancho made his schoolboy dream a realityThe footballers who escaped East BerlinWhy is this German club dividing football so much?Longer reads and moreThe strange tale of how Man City conquered EuropeFifty years to the day since Manchester City won their only European trophy, we find out about a rather unusual moment of glory.From the section Man CityWho are the all-time champions of Europe?From the section European Football684 Comments'Windows blown out, roof gone, it was like a warzone' - Scottish MLS coach whose home hit by tornadoFrom the section Scottish FootballWhen might Europe's top leagues return?From the section European Football'All they wanted was an opportunity to prove themselves' - how coronavirus is affecting women's sportFrom the section SportThe sport video games you loved - and ones we missedFrom the section SportHow much can you remember about the Premier League season so far?From the section Premier LeagueWatch and listenAudioDiscover: The BBC's best sports podcastsFind the latest episode of your favourite podcast or discover something a little more different by visiting BBC Sounds' sport podcast listings page.AudioFootball Daily podcast: Keith Gillespie and Robbie Savage's hairdryerAudioThat Peter Crouch podcast: WFH: Crufts with CapelloAudioMatch of the Day podcast: Top 10 players from outside the 'big six'AudioWorld Football podcast: Brescia's Simon Skrabb and Damien ComolliAudioA Question of Sport: The PodcastAudioThe Squad podcast: Football shirts, late breakfasts and rage quittingAround the leaguesAll the latest from the Premier LeagueEuropean footballAfrican footballScottish PremiershipChampionshipWomen's footballAll leagues and cupsWatch and listenAudioDiscover: The BBC's best sports podcastsFind the latest episode of your favourite podcast or discover something a little more different by visiting BBC Sounds' sport podcast listings page.AudioFootball Daily podcast: Keith Gillespie and Robbie Savage's hairdryerAudioThat Peter Crouch podcast: WFH: Crufts with CapelloAudioMatch of the Day podcast: Top 10 players from outside the 'big six'AudioWorld Football podcast: Brescia's Simon Skrabb and Damien ComolliAudioA Question of Sport: The PodcastAudioThe Squad podcast: Football shirts, late breakfasts and rage quittingFind us hereFind out more about our BBC Sport AppHelp & FAQs

BBCSport All SportAll SportHomeFootballFormula 1CricketRugby UTennisGolfAthleticsCycling All SportHomeFootballFormula 1CricketRugby UTennisGolfAthleticsCyclingA-Z SportsAmerican FootballAthleticsBasketballBoxingCricketCyclingDartsDisability SportFootballFormula 1Gaelic GamesGet InspiredGolfGymnasticsHorse RacingMixed Martial ArtsMotorsportNetballOlympic SportsRugby LeagueRugby UnionSnookerSwimmingTennisWinter SportsFull Sports A-ZMore from SportEnglandScotlandWalesNorthern IrelandNews FeedsHelp & FAQsFootball Scores & FixturesTablesGossipTransfersAll TeamsLeagues & CupsFA CupWomenEuropean

        
            
                
            
        
    
FootballPSG awarded French title after season abandonedParis St-Germain are awarded the Ligue 1 title after it was announced the season would not resume because of the coronavirus pandemic.7habout 7 hours agoFrom the section European Football1085 CommentsMajority of players scared about returning - Aguero2habout 2 hours agoFrom the section Man CityPremier League resumption a 'non-starter', says Liverpool mayor9habout 9 hours agoFrom the section Premier LeagueResult: Which tie did you vote the best Champions League semi-final?12habout 12 hours agoFrom the section European FootballFriday's gossip - Man Utd favour Grealish move over Maddison5habout 5 hours agoBundesliga resumption decision delayed by a week8habout 8 hours agoFrom the section European FootballChelsea ask foreign players to return in case Premier League resumes 9habout 9 hours agoFrom the section ChelseaWhat is it like for footballers locked down thousands of miles from home?19habout 19 hours agoHow Mourinho changed Chelsea and the Premier League - 15 years on18habout 18 hours agoFrom the section ChelseaVideoCan you keep up with Lingard’s 40-minute workout?18habout 18 hours agoFrom the section SportKane recovered from hamstring injury, says Mourinho15habout 15 hours agoFrom the section TottenhamHow realistic are plans for Premier League resumption? 1bn euro bill to end La Liga?From the section European FootballVideoNeville's England departure 'came as a surprise'From the section EnglandVideoLearning to love their sport again - England stars in lockdownFrom the section SportCoronavirus 'could affect international calendar for two or three years'Coronavirus could impact on the international football calendar for "two or three years", says Lars-Christer Olsson, of Uefa's executive committee.Kitson wants to take over as PFA chiefMOTD podcast: Rank the best players outside the 'big six'From the section Premier LeagueNeymar & Mbappe's future and who qualifies for Europe? Coronavirus 'could affect international calendar for two or three years'Coronavirus could impact on the international football calendar for "two or three years", says Lars-Christer Olsson, of Uefa's executive committee.Kitson wants to take over as PFA chiefMOTD podcast: Rank the best players outside the 'big six'From the section Premier LeagueNeymar & Mbappe's future and who qualifies for Europe?                             Football
                
                    
                  Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
                    
                
                
              
                        
                                
                                    When is your club back in training?
                                
                                
                                    PL players will have to cover faces in training

                  PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions

                            Football
                
                    
                  Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
                    
                
                
              
                        
                                
                                    When is your club back in training?
                                
                                
                                    PL players will have to cover faces in training
                                
                        
            

                
                            Football
                
                    
                  Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
                    
                
                
              

                            Football
                        Football

                    
                  Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
                    
                

                                    When is your club back in training?
                                

                                    PL players will have to cover faces in training
                                

              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
                            Football
                
                    
                  PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions
                    
                
                
              
            
            

                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              

              
                
                            Football
                
                    
                  PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions
                    
                
                
              
            

                
                            Football
                
                    
                  PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions
                    
                
                
              

                            Football
                        Football

                  Trending
          
        
    
    
      

          
                  Trending
          
        

      
        
            
              
                Liverpool hit back at mayor on PL restart
              
                PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions
              
                Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
              
                Fergie's mind games: 'Don't let Vieira ref the match'
              
                Hamann: Werner not right for Liverpool
              
                Portugal's Primeira Liga to return on May 30
              
                Bayern intent on signing Man City's Sane
              
                Rudiger: Liverpool should be awarded PL title
              
                PL Q&A: 'Project Restart' top of agenda
              
                The 57 players who can walk out of clubs on July 1
              
            
        
      
    

        
            
              
                Liverpool hit back at mayor on PL restart
              
                PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions
              
                Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
              
                Fergie's mind games: 'Don't let Vieira ref the match'
              
                Hamann: Werner not right for Liverpool
              
                Portugal's Primeira Liga to return on May 30
              
                Bayern intent on signing Man City's Sane
              
                Rudiger: Liverpool should be awarded PL title
              
                PL Q&A: 'Project Restart' top of agenda
              
                The 57 players who can walk out of clubs on July 1
              
            
        
      

            
              
                Liverpool hit back at mayor on PL restart
              
                PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions
              
                Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
              
                Fergie's mind games: 'Don't let Vieira ref the match'
              
                Hamann: Werner not right for Liverpool
              
                Portugal's Primeira Liga to return on May 30
              
                Bayern intent on signing Man City's Sane
              
                Rudiger: Liverpool should be awarded PL title
              
                PL Q&A: 'Project Restart' top of agenda
              
                The 57 players who can walk out of clubs on July 1
              
            
        

                Liverpool hit back at mayor on PL restart
              

                PSG crowned Ligue 1 champions
              

                Aguero: Most players 'scared' to return
              

                Fergie's mind games: 'Don't let Vieira ref the match'
              

                Hamann: Werner not right for Liverpool
              

                Portugal's Primeira Liga to return on May 30
              

                Bayern intent on signing Man City's Sane
              

                Rudiger: Liverpool should be awarded PL title
              

                PL Q&A: 'Project Restart' top of agenda

                  'We are past the peak':  PM to set out lockdown exit plan next week
                    
                
                
              
            
            
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  Trump says he's seen evidence coronavirus came from Wuhan lab - but he won't reveal it
                    
                
                
              
            
            
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  'I can't work miracles': Bolsonaro dismissive as Brazil digs mass graves
                    
                
                
              
            
            
          
        
      

          
    
    
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  'We are past the peak':  PM to set out lockdown exit plan next week
                    
                
                
              
            
            
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  Trump says he's seen evidence coronavirus came from Wuhan lab - but he won't reveal it
                    
                
                
              
            
            
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  'I can't work miracles': Bolsonaro dismissive as Brazil digs mass graves
                    
                
                
              
            
            
          
        

    
    
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  'We are past the peak':  PM to set out lockdown exit plan next week
                    
                
                
              
            
            
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  Trump says he's seen evidence coronavirus came from Wuhan lab - but he won't reveal it
                    
                
                
              
            
            
              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  'I can't work miracles': Bolsonaro dismissive as Brazil digs mass graves
                    
                
                
              
            
            
          

              
              
                      
                        
                      
                
                  
                  
                  
                
              
            
    
            
              
                
    
                
                    
                  'We are past the peak':  PM to set out lockdown exit plan next week
